post.text: Más de 200 milllones de personas ya se han registrado y el número continúa aumentando. Haz tu plan para votar aquí: hillaryclinton.com/planparavotar

comment.author: Lucas
comment.text: THANK YOU HILLARY FOR LETTING ME DANCE WITH STEVIE WONDER IN PHILLY!

replies.author: Kristen
replies.text: And that's what made you support her for President? Lucas please wake up.

replies.author: Callan
replies.text: Now Lucas....don't you just feel like taking a shower ??

replies.author: Lucas
replies.text: Kristen DID I SAY THAT YOU IGNORANT FOOL? I thanked her for something. My vote is not sold for the price of an evening with Stevie Wonder.

replies.author: Lucas
replies.text: Callan Only when I watch the anti-Semites at Trump rallies. As A jew I am totally freaking out at the hatred at his rallies. SPIT actually flies from the mouths of the haters.
